overview:
With 20+ years’ experience in multiple related industries, Rajiv brings a deep grasp of technology to his finance role at Asyncast.

From his Wharton MBA and technology background, Rajiv has gained a particularly insightful understanding of the complex interplay between technology and business issues and their relationship to the financial structuring of transactions.

His work experience includes technical global sales for NetApp that involved database deployments and SAP application integration. He also started, built and managed the ERP consulting services practice for Cognizant; performed product management for Industria, a B2B marketplace startup; and worked on aerospace research and software development with Lockheed at the NASA Langley Research Center.

Rajiv earned an MBA from the Wharton School with a concentration in finance, and an M.S. and Ph.D. in Aerospace Engineering from Virginia Tech. He also holds a B. Tech. in Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology. His aerospace research has been published in more than 20 national and international journals.
